text:
ReSnap.com - https://www.resnap.com/ | Node.js Developer | Nijmegen, the Netherlands | ONSITE

We are looking for a backend developer.

ReSnap created the most easy photo book software worldwide based on artificial intelligence. The technology of ReSnap can automatically select the best pictures of a user from the thousands of pictures spread across different data sources (from mobile to Dropbox) and automatically create a beautiful photo book. And this can always be done within one minute!

Contact me through {remi} at resnap.com
